callout.help:
Get the normal callout map for a map you specify, does not have to be the exact or full name.
Let's say you want to get Camp Triggerfish. Well you can either use `%{p}callout camp` or `%{p}callout triggerfish`, whichever is easier for you.

maps.help: Get the maps and modes that are currently playable in Splatoon 2

rotation.help: Find out the time until the next rotation

tc.help: Find out when Tower Control is next in rotation

rm.help: Find out when Rainmaker is next in rotation

sz.help: Find out when Splat Zones is next in rotation

cb.help: Find out when Clam Bliz is next in rotation

no_turf.help: Setup a private battle! (Turf War excluded)

brands.help: View the brands in Splatoon 2 and their favoured and unfavoured abilities

hideandseek.help: View the rules of hide and seek

issalmonon.help: Check if salmon is currently running

salmon.help: View the current Salmon Run schedule

splatfest.help: Get the splatfest results by name

nextsplatfest.help: Get the upcoming splatfest by region

lastsplatfest.help: Get the most recent splatfest by region

splatfestroles.help:
Add to your server the roles for the upcoming splatfest.
Leave region blank for all regions.
Requires Manages Roles permission

oldsplatfestroles.help:
Add to your server the roles for all the previous splatfests.
Leave region blank for all regions
Requires Manages Roles permission

meta.help: See the usage stats for weapons in the previous month for `xrank` or `league` - specify a game mode for specific information
meta.examples:
%{p}meta xrank
%{p}meta league rainmaker
%{p}meta xrank clam blitz

splatnet.help: View what's in the SplatNet shop!

about.help: Find out more info about the bot!

shards.help: Find out about how our bot is sharded!

devmail.help:
Send a message straight to the developers of Spyke!
This command allows you to send feedback and suggestions, alongside manually reporting any issues or bugs
However for easy access to a conversation, join our support server (`%{p}support`)
Please don't use it as a way to say hi. If you wanna say hi to us, please join the support server
devmail.examples:
%{p}devmail Hey! this command seems to be erroring
%{p}devmail I think it'd be great to add this feature
%{p}Thanks for making a great bot guys!

invite.help: Invite the bot to your server!

ping.help: Use this to double-check the bot's working. The higher the number, the slower the bot will take to respond, usually meaning Discord or our servers are down. Sorry if there's any connection issues!

reply.help: Respond to a DM that a developer has sent you

set.help:
Sets the server's custom prefix (the original will still work).
Requires the Manage Server permission. To use spaces in your prefix quote it.
You can even use a space at the end of the prefix.

remove.help:
Removes the server's custom prefix.
Requires the Manage Server permission
